overview: Pre-school series focusing on the adorable antics of four, fruit-tea-loving bird-like characters: Great BigHoo, Toodloo, Chickedy and Chick. Silly, fun and full of surprises, Twirlywoos combines stop-frame animation and live action sequences set in the real world. Episodes include - Up, All Gone, Covering, Up and Down, Over, Shorter and Shorter, Soft, Noisy.
title: Twirlywoos - Time for Tea
